body.content:
Attn: Dear Sir/Madam,

*FINANCIAL MANAGEMENT AND BUSINESS PARTNERSHIP REQUIRED TO INVEST FUNDS
INTO YOUR COMPANY *.

This business proposal is for your mutual consideration, i came across your
contact  in search for a good business relation. A very good friend of mine
who is a financial consultant has the contact of politicians from the Gulf
region precisely. This group of politicians have acquired so much
investment / fiscal liquid cash from their countries' resources due to
their political powers.

Meanwhile,he has briefed me about one politician now in Gulf region  who
needs an investment Management Manager in Europe, Asia and America,
according to my friend the fund will be re-invested strictly under
investment manager which allows you the manager to control the initial
title because the investor would not want the fund to have any bearing or
traces of investment fund to him or to their family. Note, this principle
remains the immediate option to protect his still future political
ambitions in his country maybe after 10 years.However, he is an investor
who would like to invest in your business as long as you have great
profitable business ventures and opportunities.

Awaiting for your affirmative reply so that I can give you more details of
the investors family fund.

NOTE: This email is personal and highly confidential.

Yours respectfully,
Mr Morgan Matt
(Broker)


*CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE:*
This e-mail contains information that is privileged and confidential and is
intended only for the individual(s) or entity named. It is also subject to
legal restrictions and penalties regarding its unauthorized disclosure or
use. You are prohibited from copying, distributing or otherwise using this
information if you are not the intended recipient. If you are not the named
addressee you should not copy, disseminate or distribute this email. You
should notify the sender immediately and delete it from your system. If
this email is sent to you and you have signed an NCND with  Mr Morgan Matt  any
information contained herein is governed under that NCNDA and may not be
copied, disseminated or distributed to any third parties without the
express consent of the sender.

*DISCLAIMER:*
The information contained herein has been obtained from reliable sources
believed to be complete and guarantees accuracy. This communication
(including any attachments) is covered by Electronics Communications
Privacy Act 18 U.S.C. 2510-25212701-2710,3121-3126 and is confidential &
legally privileged. Information contained in this E-Mail message is
intended for a specific individual(s) & purpose & therefore is protected
from disclosure under the Gramm-Leach-Bliley Act. Upon receipt and
acceptance of these documents, you as the Recipient(s) acknowledge this
warning and disclaimer.

header.subject: FINANCIAL MANAGEMENT AND BUSINESS PARTNERSHIP REQUIRED TO INVEST FUNDS INTO YOUR COMPANY .
